· Black Friday event preparations; it’s the biggest sale in Langley Falls!
· More chances to get Epic Items! Now you have the chance to get Epic items from the chests in the Market, when your Situation Room is Level 3 and above!
· Additional bugfixe

Agents, we are proud to present Familyland War update!

- New game mode! Embark on an exciting and dangerous “shopping” trip at the Langley Falls Shopping Mall to get some glitter, glue, and stickers to modify your gear!
- The Shopping Mall is unlocked once your Situation Room reaches level 8.

We're celebrating the 300th episode of American Dad! with a new unique event! Roger has shattered into tiny pieces and only you can help the Smiths save him! Complete quests, collect Hammers, and break magical jars to find Roger fragments and put him back

The holidays and long-awaited Heroes are here!

Come celebrate by gifting your Heroes a piece of the action!

Heroes:

- Unlock and upgrade Heroic Talents and Accessories to aid in battles.
- Change the skins of Heroes.

It’s never too late to start training for a winter sport! Let’s help Roger earn some medals!

Training regimen:
-Equip new armor and weapons for Gunslingers, Warriors, and Engineers.
-Be a winner and get the new Ring and Amulet!
-Uncov

Agents, cancel your Valentine's Day plans. The CIA has been compromised! We suspect Tearjerker is somehow involved. You must stop him at all costs!

Your mission:
- Get up to snuff with new equipment and jewelry.
- Retrieve our most important

Agents beware! We have evidence to believe Principal Lewis is working with a group of criminals, who will be making their move during the St. Patrick's Day festivities. They are gathering forces at O’Rrivals Pub. Do not take this warning lightly. Stay ale
